website_summaries.verdict: 15 minutes on this machine delivers a tough tension-based workout.
pros: Easy to set up and just as easy to pack away
LCD monitor tracks your calories, scan, time, and count
Three  elastic bands allow you to adjust fitness level
Saddle angle control allows you to adjust the saddle at 30, 60, and 90 degrees
cons: Some complaints about the display not working upon arrival

website_summaries.verdict: This machine adds a full range of motion to a smart lower body workout routine.
pros: Great for users needing extra stabilization or those that want to safely maintain strength in their lower bodies without weights
cons: may not be challenging enough for those looking for a push

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the assembly assistance
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Whatever you do don’t buy the $90 assembly assistance. Waste of money!! It only took me 10 minutes to put this together. There are a total of 4 pieces to attach and that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best piece of exercise equipment I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews unless I really, really like a product. Love this piece of equipment...Not only does it work your glutes but also your calves, shoulders, arms and core... I got rid of my treadmill because it was too big and bulky. Purchased this and use it every day. I feel the burn, as well as an elevated heart rate after every set. Easy assembly too. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Love....Love....Love ❣️❣️❣️❣️
customer_reviews.text: Love.....Love....Love!!!!! I can’t believe I’ve got a solid piece of exercise equipment like this at such an affordable price! I use it 2x’s a day and it’s yields quick results now I am tall and slim naturally but this is just what I needed For toning ❣️
customer_reviews.author: tabitha holifield

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from reading the other reviews and I’m glad that I did. There are more expensive versions of this type of machine, but this gets the job done. I was a little intimidated by all the pieces that came with it to put it together because I’m not that mechanically inclined, but I had my neighbor help me, And together it only took us about 20 minutes to put together. I love this. I received it in about two days.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Booty, Leg and Upper Body Burn!!
customer_reviews.text: Best $150 I’ve ever spent. Not very difficult to build. Easy storage since it collapses. Can definitely get a full cardio workout and also a leg conditioning workout. I would highly recommend I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dy

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 hip surgeries and bad knees, so I was told squats and lunges aren't the best workout for me. Yet, I would do them in my daily workout routine in order to work certain muscles (Bootie, I'm talkin bout you!). Normal I was able to do 25-30 squats at a time before my knees and hip start screaming "NOOO". With this machine I'm able to pump out 100 squats in less than 5 minutes. No pain, just the burn of muscles. This machine makes me so excited to get into a new workout routine!
customer_reviews.author: Makenna BushieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T WORK FOR ME AND MY FRIENDS!!! But It Doesn't Mean It Won't Work For You!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very light weight and doesn't feel very supportive. I tried it out anyhow and the next morning my Knee hurt very badly...seems after 2nd use, I dislocated my knee...It didn't work for me OR my fitness buddies who tried it out...all agreed the movement on it just doesn't feel right on the legs!!!! My husband threw out the box when put it together for me, so I'm stuck with a product I wont be using :0 :(
customer_reviews.author: lady loyal

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: For starters, the weight says 225lb limit and I started using this at 260. No problems. I never thought I could do a squat in my life, but with this machine I am a champ. A little rough on weak knees. I started with no resistance and moved to one resistance band recently. Fun to use and similar motion to posting on a horse, if you're familiar with that.
customer_reviews.author: RaCat

customer_reviews.title: I love this little exerciser
customer_reviews.text: I love this little exerciser! It will work your muscles! I am happy and use it everyday! So glad I didn’t waste 3 times this on the name brand equipment! This is compact, folds down, and is sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Trujillo BFA, MED,MED, CED

customer_reviews.title: and I have pretty strong legs
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old put it together in no time. You will feel the burn fast, and I have pretty strong legs. The machine is very quiet and doesn't take up a lot of space. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alisia Grady

customer_reviews.title: Good workout and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a workout, you don't notice it as much while you're using it but the next day you can feel it. No, the bands do not stay attached when you fold it but if you can't handle hooking them back on when you go to use it then you're probably not going to stick with working out anyway....lol Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Does not works as described. My knees have been popping/clicking and in pain since I tried it. Trying to return. Who ever pre-asembled put the foot part on backwards!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly tough!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this a couple days now. The assembly was easy, and the product is well constructed. For bang for the buck, you'd be hard pressed to beat this piece of equipment. It is relatively light and compact. I remember thinking "the wife (105 lbs) should be able to handle this ok..." She spent about 30 minutes on it, working about half of it. Rolling sweat, breathing hard. I made the typical male comment: "Surprised that little thing kicked you so hard!" To which she replied "Ok, big man, give it a swing..." I spent about 15 minutes on it. Pretty much locked up today. Don't underestimate this one...
customer_reviews.author: W. B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine. It definitely works the entire leg and butt area. You can also focus on your back and back of the arms like a rower. I was looking at getting a db method brand machine, but came across this machine, and decided to go with this one. It is half the price and more versatile. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stark

customer_reviews.title: NOT like pictures or video
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review, but feel the need to this time!!! Don't waste your time and money! The video that is shown is not representative of this machine. You cannot do squats as shown because the mechanism to extend the seat is very short! The model looks like she is nearly standing to do the squats which is a joke! Very dissatisfied and not sure why the other reviews rate it high because it's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Targets muscles well
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, super easy to setup. It feels bizarre mounting and dismounting from the machine but once you get going it's really fun an natural feeling. I work out at the gym 5 days a week and got this for the wife but I have it a spin for a few minutes. It didn't feel it at the time but the next day my hams and glutes felt sore like then never do even after leg day so clearly this targets very effectively. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: ga9213

customer_reviews.title: Row squat machine
customer_reviews.text: I did find this to be someone taxing on the knees, but I do like the adjustable tension. It also has a justable seat and adjustable handle lengths. It is a nice unit and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm 29, 5'6", and 190 pounds. It took under 30 minutes for me to put it together. I do 8 sets of 20 reps throughout the day. Unfortunately, the monitor doesn't function properly so that will be tossed. All in all, I like it enough to recommend it. It works and you'll be sore. Get it and have fun! :)
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Bad on knees and not designed for proper squat.
customer_reviews.text: The way it is designed, I felt all the pressure on my knees and not my glutes, quads or hamstrings. The pedals are designed for the front of your foot, but when doing squats, it should be for your heels. I kept adjusting to try and get the pressure to the glutes and was even going to turn the pedals around for heel push off rather than the ball of foot, but it was still just angled wrong for proper squat form. It is indeed lightweight, easy to assemble and fold though.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia F.

customer_reviews.title: Holy burn!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This thing is amazing. Don’t waste 200+ on that DB thing if you were going to. I got this instead and so happy I did! Was super easy to assemble, it doesn’t take up much room, easy to fold and I’m so out of shape cause I could barely make it 2 min let alone 10 min lol. I feel it in my thighs, butt, core which is exactly what I wanted it for. I probably won’t be able to walk tomorrow lol. Highly recommended! Oh and it’s easy on my knees. I have bad knees so I can’t do squats and even the treadmill hurts them. This is going to be great for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged and with absolutely no bolts or instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I am a person that stays in shape, I go to orange theory classes twice a week, I have a gym in my house (marcy free weights)...I needed something to help me with my lower body workout because my knees with free weights hurt (dance, track and field damage). This machine is awesome! Easy setup and really works, my husband said it's gonna be a scam and now I can say after we tried it "I told you so"...hubby was so wrong, not a scam! Really excited to do my workout tommorow!
customer_reviews.author: Lidija Misic

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rower because my left knee is due for a replacement - no longer can do daily 45 min aerobics. The rower allows me to sit higher than an average chair, I can place my left foot on the floor, my right foot on the push plat - this way my right leg gets the majority work out, my left knee only does mild bending. Full upper body work out. Good replacement for my usual daily aerobics - keeps me sane. After the knee replacement this will be great - looking forward to using both legs. Assembly is easy, good quality, sturdy, quite. I am 73 years, 5' 9", 135 lbs. Please wish me luck with my new knee!
customer_reviews.author: Ardana C. Paulis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to do squats, if you use it correctly. Gives my butt and thighs a good workout. I don't find it that hard to do them with the tightest setting. I'm a 51 year old female who is not in good shape and I do 100 every other day. One thing you have to make sure is that you are not using your arm strength for anything but support. Use your legs as much as possible and sit up as close to the front of the seat as possible. if you pull with your arms, you're losing the effectiveness of the squat.
customer_reviews.author: tbear

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble . I love it. I could tell a difference in my joints immediately. I'm 67 and this has been life changing. I do 15 squats in the a.m., 15 in p.m. this first week. Will bump it up as I go along..
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Get it Now, Before the Price Goes Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a full body workout and I sweat profusely. It's great quality, durable and doesn't take up a lot of space. It was so easy to put together, I didn't need instructions, it took about 5 minutes. I got mines the next day at an excellent price. I would highly recommend you add this to your arsenal. Fun times....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine as a less expensive alternative to the DB Method equipment. Very easy assembly (about 30 minutes by myself). The workouts are great (you can find them on YouTube) and really give you an all over body workout. Even with just one resistance band attached, I was feeling it in my butt, legs, arms, and back. Would definitely recommend this machine if you need a total body cardio + strength workout and are pressed for time. I haven’t been using it long enough to post results, but judging by how sore I am the day after, I can say it is definitely working the right areas!
customer_reviews.author: huggyface

customer_reviews.title: Work from home heaven
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time today and I’m impressed. I bought something to tone my rear and be able to do proper squats since my knees are troubled. I did 100 today and will do 25 additional each day. I can feel it in my arms and my core a little bit also. It’s very quiet and easy to move around the house. Definitely a great investment and works perfectly while I’m quarantined for COVID 19.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The frame broke!
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until it broke catastrophically and pitched me backward onto the floor. You get what you pay for. It lasted about 20 months, but this failure mode could seriously injure someone. As a bonus, the tension cords are starting to fray. I’m 5’9”, 165lbs. This shouldn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: ApeW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together! This is a first! The positions keep me using the correct form!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get this product for some time now. I like to take my time with purchasing exercise equipment. I deplore waisting money or using it as a clothes hanger. I love it! I have lost not one pound but my Love says he can tell a difference. Been using consistently now for 2 weeks. So these are the b4 photos, I'll come back with the after photos! Excited 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kassi

customer_reviews.title: Just get the dB method!
customer_reviews.text: If you are seeking out a cheaper alternative to the dB method don’t waste your money on this one. This machine works the top of your thigh. That is all I feel when I use it. I use it exactly how you are supposed to use it. Get the dB method!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this machine! I was able to put it together myself in about 20-30 mins. The machine folds easily, and doesn’t take up a lot of space. The bands definitely add resistance when squatting, but if you’re use to squatting heavy this may not be enough for you. Arrived fast and has come in handy while sheltering I’m place. I do wish it held more than 220 pounds because I have a sibling that would like to use it. They did try it though, and it seemed to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Saw a huge difference in a short time!
customer_reviews.text: I kept seeing ads for the db method machine but didn’t want to spend the money. I found this awesome machine on here and from the warehouse. It came fully put together with zero issues for an an amazing price! I keep it right in my bedroom and do it morning and night. I love that you can adjust it to work different parts of your body and that it has resistance bands to make it more difficult. I can’t wait to show before and after pictures! Definitely buy this if you were thinking of getting the other brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bonnett

customer_reviews.title: Threw my back out
customer_reviews.text: This product was flimsy and not ergonomic. I threw my back out after using it once day, and returned it
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Bike broke less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: This bike broke before i had it for 60 days. A weld gave out as you can see by the pictures. this is obliviously a defective weld and should be replaced at no charge. Still waiting to hear their verdict. I would not recommend buying this product. This is my second one, the first had a different weld give out, but at least we were able to use it for 2 years and felt we got our moneys worth. also the price increased 50%. the original was $99.00 when we bought it. The replacement was $149.99 and lasted less than 60 days...come on!
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It was very easy to assemble. I think it took 10 minutes max to put it together. It's also very easy to adjust to your height.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: So happy I gave this a chance
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before but HAD to for this workout device. I received it May 2020 (Mother’s Day present, my request). I searched hundreds of products and decided on this. I’m 50 and have a bad lower back. Took a shot. I’m so glad I did. I LOVE this device. So easy to assemble. Different resistances to choose from. The first two days I was SuperWoman. Then the pain hit. Haha. Not my back. My muscles. Took two days off. Got back on. In two months I pulled up on my 10.000 repetition. My core feels stronger which makes my back feel stronger. I’ve lost the love handles and my clothes fit better. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the DB method and was looking for a similar piece of equipment for a lower price. I stumbled upon this and am so glad I did! This is a great, very sturdy piece of equipment for half the price. I definitely feel the burn (you can build the resistance) all in the comfort of my own home. I like that I can feel this working in other parts of my body and not just my legs. Assembly was super easy! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MoDaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: 2nd BEST AMAZON PURCHASE I HAVE MADE!! JUST LIKE THE ONE I HAD 20 YRS AGO!
customer_reviews.text: ASSEMBLY A 5-STEP PIECE OF CAKE, I DID MAKE ONE ERROR & TRIED TO DROP IN THE FRONT BAR WITHOUT LOOSENING (THE KNOB, # 10)...THOUGHT IT DID NOT FIT. TURNING THE KNOB & PULLING OUTWARD & THE FRONT SHAFT DROPPED RIGHT IN. BUT THIS IS A FULL BODY MACHINE IF YOU TOGGLE TENSION & YOUR STRENGTH BETWEEN MUSCLE GROUPS. 1ST LET YOUR LEGS BEAR THE WEIGHT, ( DIFFERENT ANGLES INCLUDING TOES ENPOINTE , CENTER OF FEET, FEET POINTED OUT, ETC. THEN SHIFT TO ARMS & GIVE ALL OR MOST OF WEIGHT/TENSION TO ARMS; VARY ANGLES AT DIFFERENT POSITIONS AROUND THE CONTROL ARM, . GREAT BACK SUPPORT FOR SQUATS. GOOD BUY.
customer_reviews.author: E. F.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Effective
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment for the legs. Will give you a good solid leg workout. Was worried about the 220 weight limit, but I'm 240 and it still holds me up without a problem. That's not to say you shouldn't follow the guideline, but you can get MORE than a challenging deep squat workout with this affordable machine, and, I didn't really try the 3 tension bands under the seat. This machine is also HIGHLY adjustable and portable, can stand easily in a corner. HIGHLY recommend this for men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Geoflaw

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at quality....
customer_reviews.text: Just received today..took a second to wrap my mind around the assembly, but once my brain kicked in it went pretty fast. All pieces were in working order. Have not tried it out yet, but did do a couple test squats. The machine is very quiet, smooth, and very stable, well made. Will try to remember to post update once I have used for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: CLN...ARIZONA

customer_reviews.title: cabin fever be gone!
customer_reviews.text: my gym closed because of the covid 19 and that forced me to bring exercising to my small apartment. this machine is foldable and stands up against the wall when not in use. when I do use it, it gives my upper body and lower body a great workout, gets my heart rate up, and most of all it helps me to keep moving when i'm working from home. it makes no noise and my downstairs neighbor hasn't complained so I am thrilled. :-) i had such a positive experience with this that I am now going to buy other pieces of foldable equipment to add to this piece.
customer_reviews.author: seltzer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GLAD I GOT THIS
customer_reviews.text: THIS MACHINE IS AWESOME REALLY JUST WANTING AN AROBIC TYPE OF EXERCISE SOMETHING I COULD GET UP STAIRS BE BY MY MUSIC MOVE IT IF NEEDEDAND CAN SHUT THE DOOR FOR PRIVATE WELL THIS IS AROBIC ALL THE WAY I DONT BEND ALL THE WAY BUT I DO ROW AND AND IAM UP TO 55 MINUTES I LOVE IT AND WHAT A WORK OUT NO BANDS FOR ME JUST MOVING AND THATS A GREAT WORKOUT......................... KB PS IF I PUT IT TOGETHER BY MY SELF U CAN TOOOOO THANKS SUNNY U ARE AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Really love this exercise machine. It is so simple. It came almost all put together and easily stores away. You can either use the straps for a more weight training exercise or take the straps off the back for a cardio workout. I love that I can just get on it and do the exercises and am off of it without having to think about what I am doing with each exercise. It reminds me of the cardioglide I had years ago. I loved that as well. I did a half hour and got a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Abramides

customer_reviews.title: My legs and glutes have firmed up so much in 3 short weeks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very lightweight to move around. I have been doing a twenty minute workout that is on You Tube. I am already up to two bands. Good workout. My legs had become flabby and now they are looking good again. Well worth the money. Probably the best value of any piece of equipment that I’ve ever purchased. There are many modifications that you can do, including calves and there are several videos to follow along with. If you want to tone your legs and butt, this is the product to buy. Does not hurt my knees at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Better than the gymn
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine, it is very well made and easy to assmble, comes with the tool. It takes about 20 minutes between looking at instructions and installing a few bolts but nothing anyone can't do. It has 3 bunggie type straps that are already affixed to the machine so you can adjust the resistance. I ve used it a lot and have had no problems. Use to go to gymn untill the virus and had to use 3 different excercise machines, now this one does all 3 things I need in one. I have arthritis and keeping my muscles up is very beneficial and this machine will do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is good for your body and a strong equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love it I just started today and you can feel is working in your body love it let’s see the results in a week, I’m a breast cancer survivor and doctors told me I need to loose weight so this and some others equipments will help me, I do recommend this one 👍 easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Medina

customer_reviews.title: wow wow wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking up another squat machine and found this. Took five minutes to put together, very sturdy... After five minutes I was out of breath.. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: WattR

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this machine for 7 days so far and I love it! Already can feel a difference. I can't wait to see the results after 30 days or so. I found some workout videos on you tube to follow along with not using any resistance bands yet. I'm happy with my purchase so far. I can feel it working my legs, butt, arms and abs! Also great cardio workout that's not hard on your knees.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get it set up!
customer_reviews.text: To the girl that said “Don’t buy the assembly line” You just made my day awful. I cannot figure out this machine at all. The butt part isn’t moving up and down like it’s suppose too. I’ve read the instructions and still cannot figure this stupid thing out.
customer_reviews.author: Ash van

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I still have this machine is because I couldn’t find a way to return it. it is an evil device. I used it for seven minutes and I was ready to cry and throw it away
customer_reviews.author: billie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: As an elder kayaker who partially tore his medial meniscus, this equipment is perfect. It basically guides 'squats'. One can adjust the resistance of the 'squat', and if knee discomfort is present during the activity, one can pull harder with your arms to dynamically control the resistance. Yes, one could simply do a squat while holding onto a chair, but the advantages of controlling the resistance and/or relying on arm strength are more than worth it. The company was immediately responsive when I needed to contact them. The equipment is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy! Get started firming up butt. Arms. Thighs and back! Big thumps up
customer_reviews.text: Great little equipment for working out. Start slow, work way up bc you will feel it! Especially the next day even with stretching. Works arms, thighs, butt and back. One week of use and seeing an improvement. I don't leave reviews but I love this and want to help someone else out to tone up. Btw I purchased when it was on sale. Saved me $30 but would buy either way. Sooner getting started the better. ...also my husband put it together fairly quick. It was so easy to set up. Don't pay extra for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little machine
customer_reviews.text: Wow ok so I saw some reviews say it's for beginners and I disagree ! I usually deadlift and my max is 255 I'm 5'7 . This machine blew the dust off my traps and hip flexors !! I am amazed I'm barely starting so I'm only using one of the three bands and wow !!! My glutes are on fire ,hammies,traps,and hips I do 100 a day and man I feel a difference!! Also storing it is so easy and it doesn't take much space up ! What a great machine !
customer_reviews.author: Tata

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I’m in very good shape but I needed something I could do on rainy indoor days. Or when the sun is blazing hot. St first I thought this is too easy, but after about 10 reps I’m like wow this is great! It’s set up in my living room so I get on it throughout the day or evening or morning. It’s so smooth and quiet, not like an exercise bike at all. Way better and enjoyable. I have noticed increased strength in my knees, thighs and stsmina in general. The price is great, easy to assemble, I did it myself. I’m very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beginner to Exercise
customer_reviews.text: i'm 33, 210lbs, 5'7". I have never exercised before. I'm new to this fitness lifestyle. Let me just say using this machine is not as easy as it looks. Even after warming up I can't last long on it but I'm improving. When I just started I could only do 1minute now I'm doing 5mins. I started with one intensity band and it is a intense and great workout. I have no problems with it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: eer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I will be 47 soon and I never exercise!! This is awesome!! Has you sweating in no time. Love it. The hardest part is getting on and off the thing lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Neace

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted another squat machine but it was twice this price and would take a while to ship. So, after careful review and research, I bought this one. I figured it would be pretty flimsy and a temporary piece of equipment. However, this thing is really stable and a great piece of equipment. There are resistance bands to help challenge your workout. Its not heavy too heavy to move around. I chose not to fold mine but to leave it out and it doesn't take much room in my space. This is a solid, sturdy bike. It is not loud either. For this price, its unbelievable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Missteree

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The pieces wouldn’t even fit as designed. I’m still waiting for a call back. What a waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect squat machine, gives a great workout. If you are looking into the db method and came across this machine while researching, look no further. This machine is every bit as good, if not better, in my opinion and costs substantially less. Win, win!
customer_reviews.author: Byrdstowntn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Used this for about two weeks and now its in my closet. Wanted to feel a good burn and a little soreness the next day knowimg I got a good workout but didnt with this machine. I could easily do a 100 reps at a time and nothing. Maybe you gotta do them throughout the day? I dont know but i feel like this machine is for people with bad knees or the elderly. I was hoping to make my butt grow with tjis machine but found running uphill works better. Save your money and find an uphill instead
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this product! I have been using it for the last 3 days and I feel incredible. I was considering the DB method machine (about $150 more expensive) and this does the same thing for a lower price and it’s sturdy, effective, and easy to assemble and store. I would Definitely recommend this machine to anyone. I feel stronger in my lower back, butt, thighs and arms.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Spiry

customer_reviews.title: good machine
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it. Getting to know it is the best part. Be aware when you stop to stay away from the pedals. I believe everyone who gets it is going to like it. First of all, It doesn't make noise when I'm using it. I recommend it, especially now that most gyms are unavailable for the public Get yours ASAP you will be a happy camper with good results. N. Daal P.D. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT. I it like the song: GETTING TO KNOW YOU?......I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite piece of work out equipment. I was a body builder in my youth and have always worked out. As I get older I find somethings harder to do. Squats is very hard on my knees when using free weights and a bar which is the way I've always done them. This machine does the same thing without the knee pain. In fact, I would go as far as to say it does it better because it also works your abs. On top of that it has range (30, 60, and 90) plus you can add tension as needed. I have been looking for something like this for awhile. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: selena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine more than you can imagine! Just a few reps per day completely changed my body. I never imagined one machine could tone so many sections of your body at the same time. It’s so easy, it’s almost a sin!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline I. Stacey

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE...WILL BREAK AFTER 2 MONTHS OF AVERAGE USE!!
customer_reviews.text: This product WAS GREAT...for about 2 months. HOWEVER...the front bar began to bend in, making it utterly USELESS AND A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a pretty good exercise machine. One can work large muscle groups similar to a rower, but with the added advantage of squats. One problem, however, during the assembly, which was the left foot pedal. Either the male or female end was not threaded well. The right pedal went on easily, but not the left. Rather than return it, I just screwed it in as tight as I could, just so it wouldn't pop out. Hopefully not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great for my knee that I recently had ACL reconstruction on.
customer_reviews.author: 3BLACKDOGS

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this item because it was to easy for me and I needed something more difficult. The seat slants pretty far downward and is slippery with spandex so wear cotton! However this is a nice machine for someone who is A beginner. It is pretty good for cardio as well.
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to assemble, super easy to relocate from Room to Room
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble I had my 16 year old son put this together. He put it together rather quickly and all the parts where they are. It really works you have bands for resistance, and after not having gone to the gym for a couple months now I couldn't even do 10 of them before my legs were on fire. It's very light so it's easy to maneuver from Room to Room. I really love this machine
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is fairly simple to assemble. Not too many parts. Instructions are OK. I like it. It gives you a nice burn while working multiple muscle groups at the same time. Now it takes a little getting used to. It's not as easy as it appears. I'm adding a little extra time each time I use it. I would suggest this product for anyone looking for some variety in their workout.
customer_reviews.author: sharon keiser

customer_reviews.title: A Tough Workout - but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing will kick your tush - well, actually, your quads. I am 66 and am starting out at just 3 minutes twice a day (no bands attached). It surely gets your heartrate up, so I'm taking it easy. If you don't have 60 extra pounds like I do, it might not be as hard for you. But, you are basically lifting your body weight, so it's more difficult for those of us with extra pudge. I would highly recommend it though. Even my very thin, 6' tall husband can only do 15 minutes (and he bikes 15 miles twice a week). P.S. The machine is very quiet so you can watch TV while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: FLNewGirl

customer_reviews.title: No, does not work as stated for shorter people
customer_reviews.text: While the machine was easy to put together and is sturdy. The seat is worthless for shorter people. I can't even sit down on it to use the machine. It is not as nice and systematic as the video portrays.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Agorastos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine as an alternative to one that is all over my social media to try out. It took 10 minutes together and get all the bolts tightened. My counter works so maybe that is hit or miss. I did try out a few pulses just to make sure it would hold me (5’5” 205) and it’s solid however, I immediately got off and reduced the tension to one instead of three. I’d highly suggest starting lower until you are sure you will be able to walk the next day. All the pieces are adjustable to its good for all shapes and sizes. The seat is not comfy to me but that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: AnonReviewer976431852

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and defective !!
customer_reviews.text: Was bent and caused me to fall over injuring my leg!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Srooks

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This machine is nice in concept, but mine has a huge dent/bend and thus weakened frame. I reached out to the seller multiple times and they’ve done nothing to resolve the matter.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene O.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible everything
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this item. Came broken with a torn up box tapes with ineffective green tape all over it. I’ve tried to return. No such luck. So now I have a big ugly torn box for my family to trip over instead of the exciting exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pelo-WHO?
customer_reviews.text: This 100 dollar machine kicks butt.I've been using it for three weeks to rehab a leg and its amazing. My whole body is transforming...arms, legs, butt and abs. Just buy it and then just do it. You'll be the bomb of the beach.
customer_reviews.author: FROM TEXAS, NOT CRAZY

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed. Easy to assemble and what a total body workout. I've done at least 20 or more for 7 days now and already feel a difference in my pants! I bought this because my husband has a big weight lifting squat rack but my leg strength starting out felt really weak. In order to build some muscle I got this so I won't hurt myself. So glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: A Girl Named Evan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ~~♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This thing is amazing! I was looking into getting the DB Method when I found this. It seemed to me that it was more machine for like a 3rd of the price! I got it 10 days ago. put it together and did my first workout. After only 10 minutes of reps and stop, reps and stop I was sweaty and my heart was racing! It packs a punch for sure. It is a hard workout but it is so worth it and I can't wait till I'm able to go longer! I fully recommend it. I'm going to alternate my workouts on this .. I love it. My husband also joined. We are loving it 😍
customer_reviews.author: kyong burgher

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Just put together and tried for first time. Assembly was super easy, pretty much pre assembled for you, you just have to undo nuts and bolts and put it on the main piece and redo nuts and bolts. Very light (25lbs) and easy to shove over to the side when done. I tried one resistance band for 10 mins..my legs are jello! Excited to see results. Will uodate in 2 weeks ! 4 stars for now , until results are seen .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of the health rider of long ago
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this piece of excercise equipment is well worth it. Unlike the health rider, you can adjust the resistance and to get a challenging workout or breeze it for cardio. It works upper back, rear delts, mid and lower back and the dreaded quads. Then to top it off, a great long stretch down the back and glutes. Very versatile. In front of the television or with your fav music, a cool drink, you can cardio it as long you want to.
customer_reviews.author: lewwho

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with "no space" for equipment
customer_reviews.text: Received within 1 week of order and put together (by myself) in less than 30 minutes. I promised myself 10 minutes a night for the first couple of weeks. Well, 1st night I was tired and sore in the morning. So, had to wait until the next night. I feel muscles I haven't felt in quite some time. And ALL the ones I wanted to feel! Only bummer? I need to be better with my lower lumbar support during exercise. Yes, it definitely helps with form, but lower back needs slow and steady strengthening. I easily fold it and it fits in my closet (I stand it up). Be safe and have fun!
customer_reviews.author: wetpepper

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 30 days with no results. I can feel the workout in my quads, but not one feeling in my glutes. This item should be sold with a workout schedule, which may have been helpful. If you are going to spend the money, purchase the real thing DB Method Equipment for $229. I wish I would have just tried that instead of the least expensive method. The old saying you pay for what you get. Because I am so displeased with this product, it will be a long time before I purchase another Sunny Health & Fitness product if ever. With all this being said, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lvnlocs4life

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! shipped & delivered in less than 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the burn from the very first use and the best part is it’s so much easier than regular squats. You get a fun workout while working your legs, glutes and thighs. Easy to assemble, slim and compact when folding it. Super light weight. I was very surprised to find an easy workout machine that tightens my body and isn’t just another item that will sit in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Megan LaPlante

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: So easy to do. Started with 25 reps to 150 total now at 50 reps totally 200. Takes minutes, gets you warn out and has enabled me to do regular squats by the 10's! NEVER was a good squatter! Needed to strengthen legs for mountain hiking and am finding this thing does the trick. Been using it for near 3 weeks now daily. No issues what so ever. Very quiet, moves smoothly, simple to put together, and very sturdy. Amazing value and great results!
customer_reviews.author: christinemf

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to assemble and use. It’s a great workout to get basically your squats in but ensure proper form and make it a little more challenging
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for full body work out- loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this last week and I am Extremely happy with this machine. It’s just what I was looking for - giving me a full body work out. Good quality and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for Men and Women
customer_reviews.text: The product page leans toward women. Don't be fooled. This was assembled yesterday and I did what I thought was a light quick workout. Seriously only 10 reps. Today I feel it in my thighs and glutes. Do not underestimate this unit's effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Naran

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little too tall for it.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a very effective workout for almost the entire body. The only snag for be is that is just a bit too small for my frame. I'm 6' 3" and with the arms and seat full extended I still don't fit comfortably. If I were to be sitting where I should the seat would need about another four inches of length. Its really a shame because I don't think you can beat it for the price.... if you're the right size to fit. They really should have a recommended height limit in the description besides just the weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Morse

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I am doing something wrong but this seems to work my arms more than anything else. It comes pretty much assembled and is easy to use. Even my kids have fun using it but I really don't see it working the glutes. It does a great job of working the arms though! It is compact, easy to move so I'll keep it. Just a tad disappointed that it does not do what it is supposed to but for the price, I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Effective Strength and Cardio
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly sturdy machine for the price. Assembly was easy and I’m not particularly great at assembly usually. I’ve had it for a couple of weeks and I’m still getting used to it and trying out new workouts on it. I feel it in my quads and calves easily but have to focus and adjust to target my hamstrings or glutes more. I think it’s just part of the learning curve. I try to use it for multiple short workouts a day. I get to cardio HR (on my Fitbit) within 2 minutes on it.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineAZ20

customer_reviews.title: easy squat exercise and glutes workout during COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: Since COVID-19 break out, we all have to stay home, can't go to the gym to have my regular work out. I search up amazon and come a cross with Sunny Health & Fitness Squat Assist Row-N-Ride Trainer for squat Exercise and Glutes Workout it has a great review and the price is decent so I ordered one. It arrive fairly soon, but the assemble was took me a while to figure it out, it's not the easiest assemble but I manage to put it together. Now I can watch my Netflix will doing my work out, it's easy and doesn't take up too much of my space.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a month. I do 4 sets with 15 reps, 4-5 days a week. I’ve seen an improvement in my butt with roundness and some of the dimples have disappeared! I love this machine. It’s working for me! It’s easy to assemble, I did it myself and it folds for storage. I was going to get the DB machine but I’m satisfied with this because it’s much cheaper. Also, my stomach is going down probably because I hold it in while doing reps.
customer_reviews.author: DE DE

customer_reviews.title: Great full body workout exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with how much thought went into assembling this rower, which made it easy to put together. The range of motion is really good, which gives you a nice stretch while you work your core, glutes, thighs, etc. It's easy to move around or fold up and it's just very inviting to hop on it and get a quick workout a couple of times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Badenof

customer_reviews.title: I'm super lazy and I USE IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lazy person. Seriously. This thing has me coming back to it each morning. It is easy to use. Has different levels for how far down you want the squat to go. Don't get me wrong, it takes effort to do the squats. There is up to 60 lbs of resistance on it. I started using it in January, try to do at least 10 a day, and I write it all down to keep myself motivated. I have noticed a difference in my legs- they have slimmed down a little.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P.

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what this is for other than looking like an idiot. I’m an athlete and I thought this would be a cute little Squat machine with row action when in fact it does neither. It’s more of a seesaw for children. It works barely any muscles it’s not a real row or a real Squat. Just a piece of garbage preying on people that don’t know fitness 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Allyg121

customer_reviews.title: Does it work? Yes!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a bit unsatisfied with how flimsy it felt with hopping on to use it for a work out. After I did the first set of 50 reps, it burned. I liked the workout. It burned around my calves, thigh (quadriceps), and the arms. I didn't feel it for the abs or the glutes. I will update in about a month for another review.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Yang

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Squad Assist Row and Ride
customer_reviews.text: This Squat Assist is the greatest. I had back surgery about 6 months ago and my physician recommended this type of exercise equipment. I am now more limber, having much less pain and my arms and legs are so much stronger. I have it sitting in front of the TV and use it periodically throughout the day. I have more "wind" and my pulse rate and B/P have decreased dramatically and even my butt is firmer. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: If you want big quads and your ass will still lie
customer_reviews.text: So I have no butt, was hoping this would be my thing, despite that I cheerleaded, ran track, played basketball, softball and ultimately collegiate volleyball. At 38 years old I am now looking for anything that can help my hamstings and butt. I can’t even use this machine for more than 3 minutes because all it does is works my quads. They are getting huge! No joke, I have no pain in my buttock nor my hamstrings even. It’s 100% in my quads... what girl wants that. I have no feeling in my ass from this machine it’s 100% my quads, yes it hurts, yes I sweat, but my ass hasn’t felt one part of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sunny Health & Fitness Squat Assist Row-N-Ride Trainer for Squat Exercise and Glutes Workout
product_meta.description: Develop strength, speed and lean muscle tone with the Sunny Health & Fitness No. 077 Home Squat Machine. This exerciser promotes compound movement (two or more muscle groups working cohesively) to strengthen not only your lower body but also your shoulder, arms and back. Activating multiple groups of muscles requires more energy, so you’ll burn more calories throughout your workout. Compound exercises bring compounded results. With 3 adjustable resistance bands, intensify your workout by simply adding or subtracting bands, each band adds approx. 22 lb of resistance.
feature_bullets: The NO. 077 Trainer includes access to an online training video within the package. THE TRAINING VIDEO IS ONLINE ONLY AND WILL NOT INCLUDE A DVD IN THE PACKAGE
DIGITAL MONITOR: Use the digital monitor to follow your workout progress with the ability to track time, calories, count, and scan.
ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE: The three resistance bands can be added or removed to adjust the resistance of your workout to your fitness level. Each band is approximately 22 lb of resistance.
ADJUSTABLE SQUAT DEPTH: Adjust the saddle angle to 30, 60, or 90 degrees to add depth to your squat and variety to your workout program.

VERSATILE HANDLEBARS: Take advantage of multiple hand positions to work muscles in your back and chest. Adjust the machine to your body length with the handle and saddle distance control, to ensure proper form with every squat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
